comments:
If you try to import into a remote project the Finish button is not enabled.  If you pick a local project then pick a remote project the Finish button is enabled, but you get NPE's when clicking Finish.

Steps to Reproduce:
0. Create a local Java Project in the Java perspective.
1. Find some folder, right click and select Create Remote Project.
2. Find another folder, right click and select Import to Project.
3. Select the remote project you created for Into Folder.
4. You will see the Finish button is not enabled.
5. Select a local project for the Into Folder.
6. Finish is enabled.  Select the remote project you created again.
7. Click Finish!

Errors:
RSEF8052E: Unable to import /home/milanaz/public_html/ajax/.project: java.lang.NullPointerException
One for every file I tried to import.

Error Log shows:
